title: the Courts (Supplemental Provisions) Act 1961 (No. 39 of 1961), section 16 of
heading: (a) This Order may be cited as the District Court Districts and Areas
text_raw:
1. 

(a) This Order may be cited as the District Court Districts and Areas 
(Amendment) and Variation of Days and Hours (Letterkenny) 
Order 2022. 

(b) This Order shall come into operation on the 1st of July 2022.
text_norm: 1 (a) order may cited district court district area (amendment) variation day hour (letterkenny) order 2022 (b) order shall come operation 1st july 2022

title: the Courts (Supplemental Provisions) Act 1961 (No. 39 of 1961), section 16 of
heading: 2. The First Schedule to the District Court (Areas) Order, 1961 (S.I. No. 5
text_raw:
2. The First Schedule to the District Court (Areas) Order, 1961 (S.I. No. 5 
of 1961), is hereby amended by the substitution at reference number 65 for the 
matter in column (4) of the following: 

“Letterkenny – First, Second, Third and Fourth Monday in each 
month. First Tuesday in each month. First and Second 
Wednesday in each month. First, Third and Fourth Thursday in 
each month. All sitting at 10.30am “
text_norm: 2 first schedule district court (areas) order 1961 (s.i no 5 1961) hereby amended substitution reference number 65 matter column (4) following letterkenny - first second third fourth monday month first tuesday month first second wednesday month first third fourth thursday month sitting 10.30am

title: the Courts (Supplemental Provisions) Act 1961 (No. 39 of 1961), section 16 of
heading: 3. The Second Schedule to the District Court (Areas) Order, 1961 (S.I.
text_raw:
3. The Second Schedule to the District Court (Areas) Order, 1961 (S.I. 
No. 5 of 1961), is hereby amended by the substitution at reference number 59 
for the matter in column (4) of the following: 

“Letterkenny – First, Second, Third and Fourth Monday in each 
month. First Tuesday in each month. First and Second 
Wednesday in each month. First, Third and Fourth Thursday in 
each month. All sitting at 10.30am “
text_norm: 3 second schedule district court (areas) order 1961 (s.i no 5 1961) hereby amended substitution reference number 59 matter column (4) following letterkenny - first second third fourth monday month first tuesday month first second wednesday month first third fourth thursday month sitting 10.30am

title: the Courts (Supplemental Provisions) Act 1961 (No. 39 of 1961), section 16 of
heading: 4. Business transacted in the District Court that is initiated and not
text_raw:
4. Business transacted in the District Court that is initiated and not 
completed before commencement of this Order shall be continued and 
completed as if this Order had been in force at the time at which such business 
had been initiated. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 14th June, 2022. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [283] 3 

GIVEN under the Seal of the Courts Service 
 8 June 2022 

PAUL KELLY, 
 Member of the Board of the Courts Service authorised to sign 

documents under the Seal of the Courts Service. 

MAURA HOWE, 
 Officer of the Courts Service designated for the purpose of 

authenticating the Seal of the Courts Service, pursuant to 
section 10 of the Courts Service Act 1998. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [283]

text_raw:

interpretation.) 

This order provides for the variation of Days and Hours at Letterkenny
